classes.name: slider
classes.description: Class around entire slider interaction

classes.name: slider__bar
classes.description: Wrapping class for the slider bar

classes.name: slider__vertical
classes.description: Wrapping class for slider in vertical orientation

classes.name: slider__span
classes.description: Wrapping class for span elements

classes.name: slider__volume-control-icon
classes.description: Wrapping class for the volume control icon when volume control mode is enabled

classes.name: slider__wrapper
classes.description: Wrapping class for slider

classes.name: slider__left-out-selection
classes.description: In ranged mode, class for slider bar left of thumb

classes.name: slider__right-out-selection
classes.description: In ranged mode, class for slider bar right of thumb

classes.name: slider__selection
classes.description: Class applied to selected values. Modify 'width' and 'height' for horizontal and vertical selection value changes, respectively

classes.name: slider__selection--active
classes.description: Class applied via JavaScript when slider is active

classes.name: slider__thumb
classes.description: Class for slider thumb

classes.name: slider__thumb--active
classes.description: Class applied via JavaScript when slider is active

classes.name: slider__thumb--horizontal
classes.description: Modifier for horizontal orientation. Modify 'left' to change position

classes.name: slider__thumb--vertical
classes.description: Modifier for vertical orientation. Modify 'bottom' to change position

classes.name: slider__bar
classes.description: In ranged mode, class for leftmost thumb

classes.name: slider__thumb-min--horizontal
classes.description: Modifier for horizontal orientation. Modify 'left' to change position

classes.name: slider__thumb-min--vertical
classes.description: Modifier for vertical orientation. Modify 'bottom' to change position

classes.name: slider__thumb-max
classes.description: In ranged mode, class for rightmost thumb

classes.name: slider__thumb-max--active
classes.description: In ranged mode, class applied via JavaScript when slider is active

classes.name: slider__thumb-max--horizontal
classes.description: Modifier for horizontal orientation. Modify 'left' to change position

classes.name: slider__thumb-max--vertical
classes.description: Modifier for vertical orientation. Modify 'bottom' to change position

classes.name: slider__bubble
classes.description: Class applied for slider bubble

classes.name: slider__limit
classes.description: Class applied for slider max and min limit

classes.name: slider__limit--hidden
classes.description: Modifier to hide limit

classes.name: slider__floor
classes.description: Class for floor(min) limit

classes.name: slider__floor--vertical
classes.description: Modifier for vertical orientation

classes.name: slider__ceil
classes.description: Class for ceil(max) limit

classes.name: slider__ceil--vertical
classes.description: Modifier for vertical orientation

classes.name: slider__popover
classes.description: Class for slider popover value. In ranged mode, leftmost thumb. Modify 'left' to change position

classes.name: slider__popover--visible
classes.description: Modifier for popover to be visible

classes.name: slider__popover-high
classes.description: ranged mode, class for slider popover value rightmost. Modify 'left' to change position

classes.name: slider__combined
classes.description: In ranged mode, class for in-between left and right thumb

classes.name: slider__ticks
classes.description: Wrapper for ticks (discrete)

classes.name: slider__ticks--hidden
classes.description: Modifier for hiding ticks

classes.name: slider__tick
classes.description: Class for specific tick

classes.name: slider__tick-selected
classes.description: Class for tick selected. In ranged mode, ticks selected in-between thumbs

classes.name: slider__inner-tooltip
classes.description: Class for value of specific tick

classes.name: slider__tick-value
classes.description: Class for tick value

classes.name: slider__button
classes.description: Base class for slider button

classes.name: slider__container
classes.description: Base container for slider

classes.name: slider__container--horizontal
classes.description: Set width for horizontal

classes.name: slider__container--vertical
classes.description: Set height for vertical

description: UI slider component to interact with slider
name: Slider
usage:
By default the slider bar is calculated based off parent container to determine slider length. For vertical, a height must be set (see demo for example). Important things to note when handling slider through JavaScript: slider__container included slider__wrapper orientation must be selected slider__selection dictates selected value and handled through css `width` through pixels or %. For vertical, modify `height` slider__thumb orientation must be selected For ranged slider, slider__thumb-min + slider__thumb-max orientation must be selected slider__limit is by default enabled or slider__limit--hidden should be applied slider__ceil for horizontal, slider__ceil--vertical for vertical orientation slider__floor for horizontal, slider__floor--vertical for vertical orientation slider__popover is by default hidden. To enable, use slider__popover--visible. For ranged slider ensure to include slider__popover-high For discrete since there is no fixed amount of ticks set, the amount of ticks set must be set by the following (this is for 3 ticks at position 0, 50%, and 100% Left): ```html
0
50
100
 ``` Important to notice there is also slider__tick-selected. These classes should be applied when slider__selection has passed the value.
